arStrings.szText: (PH) Each time you hit an enemy with {c_important}Dreadful Swarm{/c} you gain {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage vs Crowd Controlled enemies for {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_20}*{SF_21}*100|%x|]{/c}.

(PH) {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hitting an enemy affected by {c_important}Dreadful Swarm{/c} has up to a {c_number}[{SF_13}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Life Steal {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} of the damage done.

(PH) {c_important}Dreadful Swarm{/c} now creates two orbiting insects that spiral outwards over {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds and each apply {c_number}[{SF_19}*100|%|]{/c} Base Poisoning damage. Recasting {c_important}Dreadful Swarm{/c} Fears all Nearby Poisoned enemies for {c_number}[{buffduration:FEAR}]{/c} seconds.
